item1.title: Collection and use of information
item1.desc: We at Wahj collect the information you provide to us, such as personal data and contact information, in order to improve your tourism experience. This information is used to customize services, provide appropriate offers, and communicate with you regarding your reservations and inquiries. We ensure that your data remains secure and is not shared with third parties except when necessary to provide the service or in accordance with the law.

item2.title: Information exchange and disclosure
item2.desc: We at Wahj platform are keen to protect the privacy of our users, and we do not share your personal information with third parties except in specific cases. Information may be exchanged with trusted partners to provide the required services, such as tourism companies or tour operators, in compliance with regulations and laws. We may also disclose information if we are legally required or to protect the rights of the platform and its users.

item3.title: Cookies and Third Party Technologies
item3.desc: The Wahj platform uses cookies to improve your experience and customize content to suit your needs. These cookies help us analyze how you use the platform and provide personalized services. In addition, third parties, such as analytics or advertising service providers, may use similar technologies to collect data about your interaction with the platform. We ensure that this information is used securely and in accordance with applicable privacy policies. You can control your cookie settings through your browser.

item4.title: The reason why our site uses or accesses your personal information
item4.desc: We use your personal information to provide our services in the best possible way, such as completing reservations, personalizing the tourist experience, and processing requests. We also use it to communicate with you about offers and suggestions that match your preferences. In addition, we access your information to analyze performance, improve services, and ensure the security and reliability of the platform. We are committed to using your information only for authorized purposes and in accordance with our privacy policies and applicable laws.

item5.title: Protecting the security of your personal information
item5.desc: We at Wahj Platform are committed to keeping your personal information secure and protecting it from unauthorized access or illegal use. We use modern encryption technologies and advanced security measures to ensure the confidentiality of your data during its storage and processing. We also periodically review our systems to enhance protection against any security threats. However, we recommend that you keep your login information confidential and not share it with any third party to ensure the security of your data.
